content.rendered:
Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship

Preeti Bhoj is a Selfless Volunteer Service, and Preeti Bhoj is Satvic Food.

Sattvic Food

GEOKC would like to offer Prasad first to Deities (Radha-Krisha). Listed below are the Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Opportunities:

  • Preeti Bhoj followed by Satvic food

Satvic Food For:

  • GEOKC Events:
    • GEOKC Vaishnava Events
    • Ashram Events
    • Multi-purpose Events

Satvic Food For:

  • Radha-Krishna Raas Lila Temple (For Priets to offer to Deities)
  • Programs (with Fees)

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Open Dates

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Form 

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Form (PDF)

Preeti Bhoj Donation Seva

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Contacts

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Requirements

Preeti Bhoj Volunteers Help
